Nim bindings for the Geolocation Web API. Will only compile for the JS target.

Refer to this page for more information.

Types

Geolocation = JsObject
Geolocation object 
GeolocationCoordinates = ref object of JsObject
  latitude*: cdouble
  longitude*: cdouble
  altitude*: cdouble
  accuracy*: cdouble
  altitudeAccuracy*: cdouble
  heading*: cdouble
  speed*: cdouble
The GeolocationCoordinates interface represents the position and altitude of the device on Earth, as well as the accuracy with which these properties are calculated. 
GeolocationOptions = ref object of JsObject
  maximumAge*: culong
  timeout*: culong
  enableHighAccuracy*: bool
An optional JsObject passed in getCurrentPosition(). Refer to the parameters section on this page. 
GeolocationPosition = ref object of JsObject
  coords*: GeolocationCoordinates
  timestamp*: culong
Represents the Geolocation Position 
GeolocationPositionError = ref object of JsObject
  code*: GeolocationPositionErrorCode
  message*: cstring
The GeolocationPositionError interface represents the reason of an error occurring when using the geolocating device. 
GeolocationPositionErrorCode {.pure.} = enum
  PermissionDenied = 1, PositionUnavailable = 2, Timeout = 3
Refer to this page for more information 
OnError = proc (error: GeolocationPositionError): void
Type alias for the callback in getCurrentPosition() when it fails. 
OnSuccess = proc (position: GeolocationPosition): void
Type alias for the callback in getCurrentPosition() when it succeeeds.

Vars

geolocation: Geolocation

Corresponds to the global navigator.geolocation

From MDN:

The Geolocation interface represents an object able to obtain the position of the device programmatically. It gives Web content access to the location of the device. This allows a website or app to offer customized results based on the user's location.

Procs

proc clearWatch(gelocation: Geolocation; watchId: cint): void {.
    importjs: "#.clearWatch(@)", ...raises: [], tags: [].}
Removes the particular handler previously installed using watchPosition(). 
proc getCurrentPosition(gelocation: Geolocation; success: OnSuccess;
                        error: OnError = nil; options: GeolocationOptions = nil): void {.
    importjs: "#.getCurrentPosition(@)", ...raises: [], tags: [].}
Determines the device's current location and gives back a GeolocationPosition object with the data. 
proc isGeolocationAvailable(): bool {....raises: [], tags: [].}

Helper proc to determine if Geolocation API is available.

Not originally part of the Geolocation API. 

proc newGelocationOptions(maximumAge, timeout: Natural; enableHighAccuracy: bool): GeolocationOptions {.
    ...raises: [], tags: [].}
Create a new GeolocationOptions. To be used with getCurrentPosition 
proc watchPosition(gelocation: Geolocation; success: OnSuccess;
                   error: OnError = nil; options: GeolocationOptions = nil): cint {.
    importjs: "#.watchPosition(@)", ...raises: [], tags: [].}
Returns a culong value representing the newly established callback function to be invoked whenever the device location changes.
